subject: Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The state of Pennsylvania must restore the pension of the former Penn State assistant coach Jerry Sandusky that was taken away three years ago, when he was sentenced to prison after being convicted of child molestation, a court ordered Friday.
snippet: The state of Pennsylvania must restore the pension of the former Penn State assistant coach Jerry Sandusky that was taken away three years ago, when he was sentenced to prison after being convicted of child molestation, a court ordered Friday.
